Texts.Eng: Cave was like one you saw, yes? Mew had a thought. Kevin experiments, tries following in your footsteps. Everything goes wrong. Maybe he got bored?
Kevin touched crystals. No doubt about it. Old signature, faint, but clear. Maybe Kevin's fault things went wrong. Have another beacon.
^green;Bring^reset; the ^orange;Dark Erchius Crystals^reset; to ^orange;Kherae^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
^green;Fetch ^orange;Dark Erchius Crystals^reset; from the ^orange;Dark Erchius Mining Facility^reset;
